sentences.en: A is the nominal output of the auxiliary signal.
sentences.cn: A是附加信号的额定输出.

sentences.en: An auxiliary banquet was prepared in the diningroom.
sentences.cn: 在餐厅里增设了一场宴会.

sentences.en: Auxiliary controls such as screen - splitters , rulers, and scrollbars can be smaller and more closely spaced.
sentences.cn: 辅助控件,如屏幕分割器 、 标尺和滚动条可以更小,空间上也可以更紧凑.

sentences.en: Consider changing how you display auxiliary information or functionality.
sentences.cn: 旋转时如何显示辅助信息或者功能.

sentences.en: Esperanto was invented as an auxiliary language.
sentences.cn: 世界语是作为辅助语发明的。

sentences.en: I work in an auxiliary unit.
sentences.cn: 我在一家附属单位工作.

sentences.en: It'serves here as an auxiliary verb, as in sentence 4.2 a.
sentences.cn: 就像在句子4.2a一样, 它在这儿做助动词.

sentences.en: Specialization and generalization are important sources of useful auxiliary problems.
sentences.cn: 特殊化与一般化是有用的辅助问题的重要源泉.

sentences.en: The auxiliary fuel tank is made of polyethylene.
sentences.cn: 副燃油箱是用聚乙烯制造的.

sentences.en: The auxiliary units are called in only when the main force has been overtaxed.
sentences.cn: 只有在主力军承受过重压力时才会召来预备部队.

sentences.en: The hospital has an auxiliary power system in case of blackout.
sentences.cn: 这家医院装有备用发电系统以防灯火管制.

sentences.en: The restaurant is operated by the Palo Alto Auxiliary for the benefit of the Lucile Salter Packard Children's Hospital.
sentences.cn: 这家餐厅由帕洛阿尔托附院经营，收益用来资助露西尔·帕卡德儿童医院。

sentences.en: This applies to the auxiliary tool that the factory plans namely.
sentences.cn: 这就是适用于工厂规划的辅助工具.

sentences.en: Three types of auxiliary conditions are of interest.
sentences.cn: 三种辅助条件是有意义的.

sentences.en: Views ( understand the way the principle views and auxiliary views are constructed ).
sentences.cn: 视图 ( 了解基本视图及辅助视图的形成 ).

words.tran_cn: 助动词；辅助者，辅助物；附属机构

phrases.tran_cn: 辅助装置，辅助设备；附属装置
辅助设备，附属设备；备用设备
附属服务设备；附属服务

trans.tran_en: auxiliary workers provide additional help for another group of workers

trans.tran_cn: 助动词，辅助人员，附属机构
trans.tran_en: a worker who provides additional help for another group of workers
